Parking Welcome to Parking! To move tabs just scroll them Get started! All fields required not to be empty! Please, make sure all fields have the correct input! Input hint disabled! Undo Cars not founded There are no cars added. Would you like to continue? There are no cars founded. You can add them from \"Garage\" menu There are no cars added. Would you like to add some?

Time remaining: Add car Cancel Add Duplicate name or licence plate Save Data updated! Car with input licence plate is already created! Car has been deleted! Save Last Name Stop Hint enabled! Permission This App needs a permission to provide your automatic SMS sending. In case you do not want the app automatically send and receive messages this function can be disabled in settings. Would you like to give a permission? The App needs SMS sending permission to provide parking messages automatic sending service. You can turn on manual sending mode in App\'s settings About App Stop
